name: grud-sign
description: Simple DocuSign-like prototype with LocalStack development

scripts.dev: pnpm -r build && pnpm docker:up && pnpm seed && concurrently -k "pnpm --filter backend dev" "pnpm --filter frontend dev"
scripts.docker:up: docker compose -f devops/docker-compose.yml up -d --wait && bash devops/localstack-init.sh
scripts.clean: pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules dist build .turbo && rm -rf node_modules
